movies.title: The Hunters
movies.plot: A policeman from Stockholm comes up to Norrland in Sweden to join his brother, now that their parents are dead. While there he starts to work on a long-running case where deer have been poached and soon discovers that his brother is involved...
movies.simplePlot: A policeman from Stockholm comes up to Norrland in Sweden to join his brother, now that their parents are dead. While there he starts to work on a long-running case where deer have been ...

biography.bio: He started acting school in Malmö and went from there to the Skånska Teatern in Landskrona, performing in plays by Shakespeare or Brecht. He made a breakthrough as Puck in William Shakespeare's 'A Midsummer's Night Dream'. He also met his wife Birgitta there. The 1990s meant a lot of work in front of the camera, playing a string of policemen, most notably Kurt Wallander from Henning Mankell's crime novels.
biography.name: Rolf Lassgård

biography.bio: Lennart Jähkel was born on September 27, 1956 in Piteå, Norrbottens län, Sweden as Carl Gustav Lennart Jähkel. He is known for his work on c/o Segemyhr (1998), As It Is in Heaven (2004) and The Hunters (1996).
biography.name: Lennart Jähkel

biography.bio: Jarmo Mäkinen was born on May 29, 1958 in Karstula, Finland as Jarmo Kalevi Mäkinen. He is an actor, known for The Hunters (1996), Poika ja ilves (1998) and Musique rock de Vittula (2004). He was previously married to Ulla Laurio.
biography.name: Jarmo Mäkinen

biography.bio: Tomas Norström was born on May 23, 1956 in Södertälje, Stockholms län, Sweden as Stig Tomas Norström. He is an actor and writer, known for Kitchen stories - chroniques de cuisine (2003), A Cure for Wellness (2016) and The Hunters (1996).
biography.name: Tomas Norström

biography.bio: Thomas Hedengran was born on February 11, 1965 in Nilsvallen, Härjedalen, Jämtlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Hunters (1996), The Invisible (2002) and Marianne (2011).
biography.name: Thomas Hedengran

biography.bio: Göran Forsmark was born on February 4, 1955 in Malmberget, Norrbottens län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Hunters (1996), Musique rock de Vittula (2004) and La veuve tatouée (1998).
biography.name: Göran Forsmark

biography.bio: Rolf Degerlund was born on December 8, 1952 in Råneå, Norrbottens län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009), The Hunters (1996) and Wolf (2008).
biography.name: Rolf Degerlund

biography.bio: Editha Domingo is an actress, known for The Hunters (1996), Jour polaire (2016) and Irma & Gerd (1997).
biography.name: Editha Domingo

biography.placeOfBirth: Kortedala, Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden
biography.bio: Although born in an acting family, she wanted work that included animals when she was young. At the age of 5, she was in a production of the play 'Klas Klättermus'. When she was a 15 she received a scholarship for studying in USA and moved to Mississippi for a year. During this year she became interested in acting and decided that this was her future. Back in Sweden, she got a role in a TV-series but her first application to become a student at the Royal Dramatic Theatre was rejected. Acting lessons for 'Margreth Weivers' made the third attempt successfull. After her studies she worked both at the Royal Dramatic Theatre and Stockholm's City Theatre. She made her breakthrough with 1939 (1989). Colin Nutley saw her face on a poster for Les femmes sur le toit (1989) and cast her for his movie BlackJack (1990). She was also the obvious choice for his next movie, House of Angels (1992). Critics have called her 'the new Ingrid Bergman'
biography.name: Helena Bergström

biography.bio: Helén Söderqvist Henriksson was born on September 3, 1958 in Luleå, Norrbottens län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Pure (2010), The Hunters (1996) and Förhöret (1989).
biography.name: Helén Söderqvist Henriksson

biography.bio: Roland Hedlund was born on February 20, 1933 in Stockholm, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Adalen 31 (1969), The Hunters (1996) and Barn leker ute (2002).
biography.name: Roland Hedlund

biography.bio: Ove Tjernberg was born on December 27, 1928 in Uppsala, Uppsala län, Sweden as Sten Ove Filip Tjernberg. He was an actor and writer, known for The Hunters (1996), Trettondagsafton (1967) and Medea (1963). He was married to Hjördis Berling-Tjernberg and Ann-Marie Gyllenspetz. He died on March 7, 2001 in Östhammar, Uppsala län.
biography.name: Ove Tjernberg

biography.bio: Åke Lindman was a very skilled football player and played in the Finnish national team, he was offered a contract by the English Premier League team Swindon in the 60s but he turned it down and chose to become an actor.
biography.name: Åke Lindman

biography.bio: Harry Nyman is an actor, known for The Hunters (1996).
biography.name: Harry Nyman

biography.bio: Alf Nilsson was born on May 18, 1930 in Boden, Norrbottens län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Dalecarlians (2004), The Hunters (1996) and Flickan som inte kunde säga nej (1982).
biography.name: Alf Nilsson
